issue_description:
It seems like our workaround for checking tweets doesn't work anymore.
Currently I'm getting a 429 with the Googlebot useragent.
It seems to work _sometimes_ however, indicating that it could be a temporary issue.
I asked on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/matthiasendler/status/1479224185125748737

In the meantime let's disable Twitter checking to avoid flaky builds as in #446.

files_changed.patch:
@@ -29,7 +29,7 @@ jobs:
         id: lychee
         uses: lycheeverse/lychee-action@v1.4.1
         with:
-          args: --exclude sms-digital.com linkedin -- public
+          args: --exclude-mail --exclude php.net twitter.com sms-digital.com linkedin https://github.com/andygrunwald/your-connection-deserves-a-name -- public
         env:
           GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN}}
